name: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Data File
summary: Learn about .FBRB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: FBRB may be shorthand for "Frostbite," the game engine used for developing BFBC2.

description: Game data file used by Battlefield Bad Company 2 (BFBC2), a first-person shooter game set in a modern warfare environment; used as the container format for game data and can include various kinds of game data.
